tool_description: The Voice API is used for text-to-speech, speech-to-text and inbound/outbound voice routing. The Voice API is part of the Voice Gateway from Melrose Labs.
title: Melrose Labs Voice API

api_list.name: Retrieve text
api_list.description: Retrieve text from previously converted speech-to-text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/speechtotext/{transactionid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Release telephone number
api_list.description: Release a telephone number from your account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/numbering/{telno}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Update number
api_list.description: Update endpoint for a number

required_parameters.name: telno
required_parameters.description: Update current endpoint for a number

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/numbering/{telno}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List available numbers for a country
api_list.description: Get list of available telephone numbers for a country

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Country for which querying for available numbers

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/numbering/available/{country}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List available numbers for a country/prefix
api_list.description: Get list of available telephone numbers for a country and given prefix

required_parameters.name: prefix
required_parameters.description: Prefix within country for which query for available numbers

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Country for which querying for available numbers

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/numbering/available/{country}/{prefix}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Allocate number
api_list.description: Allocate a telephone number to your account and optionally set SIP endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sipEndpoint
optional_parameters.description: The SIP endpoint URI to where incoming calls to the telephone number (telNo) should be routed.

optional_parameters.name: telNo
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number to be allocated. Normally in full international format, beginning with '+'. For example, '+441310001111'.

api_list.name: Allocate number
api_list.description: Allocate a telephone number to your account and optionally set SIP endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sipEndpoint
optional_parameters.description: The SIP endpoint URI to where incoming calls to the telephone number (telNo) should be routed.

optional_parameters.name: telNo
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number to be allocated. Normally in full international format, beginning with '+'. For example, '+441310001111'.

api_list.name: Convert text-to-speech
api_list.description: Submit text to be converted to speech. Store as MP3 audio file.

optional_parameters.name: voiceText
optional_parameters.description: Text (ASCII) to be converted to speech MP3 audio file

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: Voice to be used for text-to-speech. Default is Salli (f) and is an English (en-US) language voice. Other choices include: Zeina (f), Arabic (arb); Celine (f), French (fr-FR). See https://melroselabs.com/services/voice-gateway/ for a full list of voices.

api_list.name: Convert text-to-speech
api_list.description: Submit text to be converted to speech. Store as MP3 audio file.

optional_parameters.name: voiceText
optional_parameters.description: Text (ASCII) to be converted to speech MP3 audio file

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: Voice to be used for text-to-speech. Default is Salli (f) and is an English (en-US) language voice. Other choices include: Zeina (f), Arabic (arb); Celine (f), French (fr-FR). See https://melroselabs.com/services/voice-gateway/ for a full list of voices.

api_list.name: Retrieve audio file
api_list.description: Retrieve audio file from previously converted text-to-speech. File is in MP3 format.

required_parameters.name: transactionid
required_parameters.description: Transaction ID for previously submitted text-to-speech conversion.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/texttospeech/{transactionid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.description: Submit speech to be converted to text. Store as text file.

api_list.name: Allocate number
api_list.description: Allocate a telephone number to your account and optionally set SIP endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sipEndpoint

optional_parameters.name: telNo
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number to be allocated. Normally in full international format, beginning with '+'. For example, '+441310001111'.

optional_parameters.name: voice
optional_parameters.description: Voice to be used for text-to-speech. Default is Salli (f) and is an English (en-US) language voice. Other choices include: Zeina (f), Arabic (arb); Celine (f), French (fr-FR). See https://melroselabs.com/services/voice-gateway/ for a full list of voices.

api_list.name: Convert speech-to-text
api_list.description: Submit speech to be converted to text. Store as text file.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com/speechtotext"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "melrose-labs-voice-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
